items.title: GAME THREAD: #10 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: The United States Naval Academy is flying into the darkness of South Bend for a prime time game against the Notre Dame Fighting Irish. All Notre Dame needs to do is win uts games and it’s in the college football playoff. So here we go… WHEN, WHERE, AND HOW TO WATCH When: Saturday, November 8 @ […]

items.title: Notre Dame fans aren’t very confident about hosting a playoff game
items.summary: The initial college football playoff rankings came out this week, and the Notre Dame Fighting Irish were selected as the #10 team in the country by the CFP committee. Some people were a little surprised by the respect shown with the #10 ranking. Because Notre Dame has four games left, and the proximity #10 has […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football’s 2026 schedule takes a different turn
items.summary: As we come into the last stretch of the 2025 Notre Dame football schedule, a lot of people have been talking about and asking about Notre Dame’s 2026 slate. items.title: STAFF PICKS: #10 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish have slowly climbed back up the rankings, and are now ranked #10 in the country in the college football playoff rankings. following their bye week. The Irish now play host to a 7-1 Navy team in prime time. There is a very large 25.5 point spread this week, and the […]

items.title: WEATHER UPDATE: Notre Dame VS Navy
items.summary: It’s November in South Bend, so that means the weather for Notre Dame Football games can be a little tough on the senses. This week, the Irish play host to the Navy Midshipmen in a prime time matchup, and it’s one that the weather forecast says could be a wet one. Although… not as much […]

items.title: Marcus Freeman updates the media ahead of Notre Dame VS Navy
items.summary: It’s been an interesting week in college football and for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish as the college football playoff talk is reaching a frenzy status. items.title: Notre Dame Football: Navy Midshipmen Q&A with Mitchell Northam
items.summary: Folks,,, I know it’s been a bit of a hiatus from an Opponent Q&A perspective, but I’m happy to be back for what will surely be a straightforward, easy, boring game against the Navy Midshipmen for our Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team, per usual in this annual rivalry game.
